1134690608.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::AppendLoot
1134690608.description: Modifier will attempt to add loot to a block entity.

1556792771.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::AlwaysTruePos
1556792771.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.

2198589344.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::BlockMatch
2198589344.description: Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.

3034820683.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::TagMatch
3034820683.description: Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location constains the tag.

3076687790.title: Block Specifier
3076687790.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

states.title: associative container
states.description: Contains members named after each state, with boolean, integer, or string values.

3523914459.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::RandomBlockMatch
3523914459.description: Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.

probability.description: Probability of the evaluating to true when the block matches.

3839910888.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::AxisAlignedLinear
3839910888.description: Predicate that evalutes to true if the block is within the distance range along the provided axis and and random number is generated between chance range

4275912652.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::AlwaysTrueBlock
4275912652.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.

45584192.title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::ProcessorRule::Passthrough
45584192.description: Modifier that leaves the state unchanged. This is the default block modifier if no other block modifier is specified.

title: struct SharedTypes::v1_21_20::JigsawStructure::Rule
description: A block rule that is evaluated on all blocks of a Structure Template. All predicates must evaluate to true in order for a block to be replaced by the output_state.

block_entity_modifier.description: A block state modifier for block entities when all predicate match.

oneOf.description: Modifier that leaves the state unchanged. This is the default block modifier if no other block modifier is specified.
Modifier will attempt to add loot to a block entity.

input_predicate.description: A predicate evaluated on the Structure Template block.

oneOf.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.
Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.
Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.
Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location constains the tag.

location_predicate.description: A predicate evaluated on the world block.

oneOf.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.
Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.
Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.
Predicate that evaluates to true if the block at the specified location constains the tag.

output_state.description: Block to replace the world block with if all predicates evaluate to true.

position_predicate.description: A predicate evaluated on the distance between the structure's world origin and the world block.

oneOf.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.
Predicate that evalutes to true if the block is within the distance range along the provided axis and and random number is generated between chance range
